interfaces.description: Top level container for interfaces, including configuration and state    data

name.description: Interface name for which igp-te params are being configured

config.description: Configuration data for IGP-TE interface parameters

Interface name for which igp-te params are being configured

delay.description: Use this attribute to specify a unidirectional, link delay value for the interface

delay-variation.description: Use this attribute to specify a unidirectional, link delay variation value for the interface

reflector-ip.description: Use this attribute to set the reflector IP.

reflector-port.description: Use this attribute to set the reflector port.

sender-ip.description: Use this attribute to set the sender IP.

sender-port.description: Use this attribute to set the sender port.

dscp.description: Use this attribute to classify traffic based on the Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) value. The DSCP value range is 0-63.Warning: In CLI show running, DSCP values with well-known names (ex.: af11, cs0) will be displayed as such.On Netconf, DSCP values will always be numeric. The string type allow up to 8 characters on well-known name.
